Package gui

Class ReturnBookFrameController

java.lang.Object
gui.ReturnBookFrameController
public class ReturnBookFrameController extends Object
Controller class for handling the return book process in the UI. Provides functionality for entering a book ID and returning the book.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    bookIdTxt
    TextField for entering the book ID to be returned.
    private javafx.scene.control.Button

    Button to initiate the return book process.

  • Method Details

    • onReturnBtnClick

      private void onReturnBtnClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event when the return button is clicked. Validates the input and attempts to return the book.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the return button.

    • returnBook

      private boolean returnBook(String bookId)
      Sends a request to the server to return the specified book.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The ID of the book to be returned.
      Returns:
      true if the book return was successful; false otherwise.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message)
      Displays an alert dialog with the given title and message.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the alert.
      message - The message to display in the alert.
